debug-entity-empty: [minerz] player entity is empty on join
itemdesc-armor-head-miner: Miner helmet with a small lamp.
itemdesc-armor-head-miner-enhanced: Enhanced miner helmet with a bright lamp.
itemdesc-bigger-miningbag: Can hold more stones, ores, minerals, and metals.
blockdesc-small-oreblastingbomb: Improvised ore blasting bomb to mine ores on a 3 block area.
blockdesc-big-oreblastingbomb: Huge ore blasting bomb to mine ores on a 8 block area. Run after ignition!
